habitat.description: Shriekers are fungal growths that emit piercing screams when disturbed, alerting nearby creatures to intruders. They often grow near violet fungi and other dangerous dungeon denizens, forming a deadly symbiotic relationship.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the shrieker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

reactions.name: Shriek
reactions.trigger: Bright light or a creature is within 30 feet of the shrieker
reactions.description: The shrieker emits a shriek audible within 300 feet of it. The shrieker continues to shriek until the disturbance moves out of range and for 1d4 of the shrieker's turns afterward.
